data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Sistan and Baluchestan, Iran to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sistan and Baluchestan, Iran
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Sistan and Baluchestan, Iran to the gospel today.
There are 2,775,000 people living in the state of Sistan and Baluchestan. Only about 14,457 might be believers.
Spirit, please convict each believer in Sistan and Baluchestan, Iran to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 2,760,543 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Brahui people.
Father, let the threatened of Sistan and Baluchestan, Iran know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Sistan and Baluchestan to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sistan and Baluchestan, Iran has a population of 2,775,000.

We estimate Sistan and Baluchestan has 14,457 people who might know Jesus, 37,473 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,723,070 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 191 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 2,760,543 lost in Sistan and Baluchestan that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

location.name: Sistan and Baluchestan
location.cities_list: Zahedan, Iranshahr, Zābol, Chabahar, Qaşr-e Qand
